Commands.description: AppInstaller.exe is spawned by the default handler for the URI, it attempts to load/install a package from the URL and is saved in C:\Users\%username%\AppData\Local\Packages\Microsoft.DesktopAppInstaller_8wekyb3d8bbwe\AC\INetCache\<RANDOM-8-CHAR-DIRECTORY>

Name: AppInstaller.exe
Description: Tool used for installation of AppX/MSIX applications on Windows 10
